SEARCH
Package com.example.wizard_project.Classes

Class PhotoHandler

java.lang.Object
com.example.wizard_project.Classes.PhotoHandler
public class PhotoHandler extends Object
PhotoHandler is a Utility class used for the User profile picture that has the method functionality: uploadImage - Upload an image to firebase storage DeleteImage - Deletes image from firebase storage loadImage - Loads an image from the firebase storage and uploads it into an image view

  • Method Details

    • uploadImage

      public void uploadImage(User currentUser, android.net.Uri imageUri, com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnSuccessListener<android.net.Uri> successListener, com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnFailureListener failureListener)
      Uploads an image to Firebase. This method uses Glide or a similar image loading library to display the image
      Parameters:
      imageUri - the Uri of the image to upload
      successListener - the listener triggered on successful upload, returns the download Uri
      failureListener - the listener triggered on upload failure, returns an exception

    • deleteImage

      public void deleteImage(String imageName, com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnSuccessListener<Void> successListener, com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnFailureListener failureListener)
      Deletes an image to Firebase. This method uses Glide or a similar image loading library to display the image
      Parameters:
      imageName - the String path of the image to delete
      successListener - the listener triggered on successful upload, returns the download Uri
      failureListener - the listener triggered on upload failure, returns an exception

    • loadImage

      public void loadImage(String imageName, android.widget.ImageView imageView, android.content.Context context)
      Loads an image from Firebase Storage into an ImageView. This method uses Glide or a similar image loading library to display the image
      Parameters:
      imageName - the path to the image in Firebase Storage
      imageView - the ImageView where the image will be displayed
